full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA NI, BKRA SHIS CHOS 'KHOR GLING GRVA BA TSANG GI GRVA BA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB AU'I TZUNG DAR HANG SO LA, RNAM SRAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL GYI DPE CHA LA MA RNYED PAR KHYER BDE ZHIG BSGRIGS BSRES PA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR DU, RNAM GA-YENG GI KHOL PO CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL BLO BZANG BDAG GIS, CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYIS GSHEGS GTOR LA DPE BLANGS TE BSGRIGS PA LA, LHA DANG YE SHES SPYAN DRANGS LDAN MKHAS PA'I TSOGS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI SHI DAR PI LIG THU DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
